title: Were railroads a turning point SAQ

content.question:
Answer all parts of the question that follows.

Many historians contend that the development of railroads in the early 1800s was a significant turning point in European history.

Respond to parts A and B.

Identify TWO specific pieces of evidence that support the contention, and explain how each piece supports the contention.

Identify ONE specific piece of evidence that undermines the contention, and explain how it undermines the contention.

topic.text: 6.3: Second Wave Industrialization and Its Effects

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
